content.intro: Passionate about building responsive and user-friendly web applications with modern frontend technologies.

content.title: About Me
content.bio: I'm a frontend developer with over 2 years of experience crafting high-performance, scalable web applications using modern frameworks like React, Vite, and Tailwind CSS. My journey started with curiosity, turned into consistent coding, and now drives my passion for building meaningful digital experiences.
paragraphs: In my current role, Iâ€™ve built reusable component libraries, integrated APIs, debugged complex issues, and optimized UI performance across multiple client-facing projects. I'm especially strong in JavaScript and love finding the cleanest, most efficient solution to a problem.

I take pride in writing clean, maintainable code and staying up-to-date with best practices. Whether it's building a finance dashboard, a job automation tool, or a custom ROI calculator, I always aim for user-friendly interfaces and responsive designs.

Outside of coding, Iâ€™m self-motivated and constantly learning â€” right now Iâ€™m leveling up my skills to break into a higher package role. Iâ€™m not afraid to get my hands dirty, explore DevOps, or automate a few things if it helps the project scale.
